official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide student loan deferment for victims of terrorist attacks.
short_title: Terrorism Survivors Student Loan Deferment Act of 2023

summary.text:
Terrorism Survivors Student Loan Deferment Act of 2023

This bill allows a borrower who is a victim of a terrorist attack to defer payment of federal student loans for up to one year.
